subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another segment
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1205338744
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Frank,
 
Still sounds great ............  And as for the wife, well...just do  what I 
do.  Let her go shopping and buy a couple pairs of expensive shoes  and NOT 
complain.  So next time she says anything about a $30.00 chip you  bought just 
remind her of the shoes sitting in her closet that she loves but is  NOT 
WEARING........:)
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 3/12/2008 12:29:21 A.M. Central Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
Yeeeeep! I'm thrilled all to hell! Don't know if it'll be good for EVP but  
it does something anyway! The Ol' Lady not giving me the hairy eyeball for  
buying s $30 chip--priceless!

Frank-S
